personas.name: Angela Martinez
personas.goal: Get fast business internet with a reliable install date and a callback appointment
personas.context: Opening a new storefront in 2 weeks; needs internet for POS terminals and guest WiFi; comparing providers after a bad experience with outages
personas.tone: Busy, straightforward, wants clear next steps

personas.name: Derrick Holmes
personas.role: Office Manager, small law firm (15 employees)
personas.goal: Upgrade internet speed and add business voice lines; schedule a sales callback
personas.context: Currently has slow internet impacting video calls; has authority to shortlist options but needs partner approval for final signature

personas.name: Priya Desai
personas.role: IT Coordinator, multi-site dental practice (4 locations)
personas.goal: Explore Ethernet/dedicated connectivity options and confirm serviceability per address
personas.context: Responsible for network reliability across locations; wants redundancy; needs to verify addresses and get an appointment with a business specialist

personas.name: Marcus Green
personas.goal: Bundle business internet + TV for guest rooms; understand options and schedule a callback
personas.context: Renovation complete; upgrading guest experience; needs coordinated install and minimal downtime
personas.tone: Collaborative, asks about timeline and setup

personas.name: Sofia Nguyen
personas.role: Operations Lead, e-commerce warehouse (30 staff, high uptime needs)
personas.goal: Add a backup connection and confirm best-fit business internet plan; schedule a callback
personas.context: Shipping scanners and cloud systems fail during outages; experienced a recent downtime event and needs a solution quickly

personas.name: Robert King
personas.role: Existing customer, franchise gym owner (2 locations)
personas.goal: Renew/renegotiate service terms and schedule a callback with sales
personas.context: Current contract nearing renewal; wants to avoid price increases; can approve purchase but wants options laid out

personas.name: Elena Petrova
personas.goal: Get help with intermittent internet dropping and be routed to support resources
personas.context: Lunch rush is impacted; staff can’t process orders reliably; needs troubleshooting steps or correct support path
personas.tone: Frustrated, short messages, wants resolution quickly

personas.name: Jamal Carter
personas.role: Existing customer, accounting contact for a manufacturing office
personas.goal: Resolve a billing discrepancy and find the right billing support channel
personas.context: Invoice amount changed unexpectedly; needs clarification and potential adjustment; not looking for new services

personas.name: Hannah Lee
personas.role: Existing customer, moving coordinator for a nonprofit (change of address)
personas.goal: Move service to a new business address and schedule a callback appointment
personas.context: Office relocation next month; needs continuity of phone/internet; wants to confirm new address coverage

personas.name: Kevin O'Brien
personas.role: Prospective customer, real estate broker (home office; uncertain if business-eligible)
personas.goal: Figure out whether to use residential portal or business service and get pointed to the right place
personas.context: Works from home, needs reliable internet for video tours; unsure whether to buy business-class or residential; starts with a vague inquiry
personas.tone: Casual, exploratory, not sure what to ask

emotions.name: Curious
emotions.description: Asks exploratory questions, requests options and comparisons, uses phrases like “what are my options?” or “can you tell me more?”

emotions.name: Excited
emotions.description: Upbeat language, quick replies, eager to schedule; uses positive framing like “ready to get this set up” or “can’t wait to switch.”

emotions.name: Trusting
emotions.description: Shares details willingly (address, timeline), asks for recommendations, and follows instructions without much pushback.

emotions.name: Professional
emotions.description: Brief, businesslike messages; focuses on requirements, timelines, and next steps; avoids small talk.

emotions.name: Matter-of-fact
emotions.description: States the issue plainly, provides specifics (invoice date, outage time), expects direct routing and minimal back-and-forth.

emotions.name: Impatient
emotions.description: Short, clipped messages; repeats questions; emphasizes urgency with “ASAP,” “now,” or “need this today.”

emotions.name: Frustrated
emotions.description: Mentions prior failed attempts or recurring issues; may use all caps or exclamation points; wants acknowledgment and fast resolution.

emotions.name: Skeptical
emotions.description: Challenges claims, asks for proof or confirmation, references past bad experiences, and questions pricing or reliability.

emotions.name: Anxious
emotions.description: Worried about downtime or deadlines; asks repeated reassurance questions about install dates, service continuity, or disruptions.

emotions.name: Confused
emotions.description: Unclear terminology, mixed requests (billing + new service), or vague descriptions; asks “who do I talk to?” or “what am I supposed to do?”

intents.name: Request Business Internet Quote & Callback
intents.description: A new business prospect wants pricing/plan info for business internet and to talk to sales.
intents.goal: Share business details and schedule a callback appointment with a sales agent.
intents.initialMessage: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?

intents.name: Bundle Internet + TV + Voice for Business
intents.description: A new lead wants a bundle across multiple services (internet, TV, voice).
intents.goal: Confirm services needed, provide high-level guidance, and schedule a sales callback.
intents.initialMessage: Do you have business bundles for internet, TV, and phone? I want to get this installed soon.

intents.name: Check Availability at a Business Address
intents.description: A new prospect wants to confirm serviceability for a specific business location before proceeding.
intents.goal: Provide the next step to verify address and schedule a callback to complete qualification.
intents.initialMessage: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?

intents.name: Explore Ethernet/Dedicated Connectivity
intents.description: A new lead asks about Ethernet or higher-reliability connectivity options for business use.
intents.goal: Capture contact and location details and schedule a specialized sales callback.
intents.initialMessage: We need something more reliable than regular broadband—do you offer business ethernet?

intents.name: Technical Support for Outage/Intermittent Connection
intents.description: An existing customer reports service issues and needs support guidance.
intents.goal: Acknowledge the issue and route them to the official support portal.
intents.initialMessage: Our internet keeps dropping every 10 minutes—how do I get tech support?

intents.name: Billing Question / Dispute
intents.description: An existing customer has a billing concern and needs the right billing support path.
intents.goal: Direct them to the support portal for billing and set expectations for resolution steps.
intents.initialMessage: My bill is higher this month and I don’t recognize one of the charges—who can fix this?

intents.name: Renewal / Contract Review Callback
intents.description: An existing customer wants to renew or review their plan, which should be routed to a scheduled sales callback.
intents.goal: Confirm renewal intent, capture details, and schedule a callback appointment.
intents.initialMessage: Our contract is up soon—can someone call me to go over renewal options?

intents.name: Change of Address / Move Service
intents.description: An existing customer needs to move service to a new business location; should be qualified and scheduled for a callback.
intents.goal: Capture new address and timeline and schedule a callback to coordinate the move.
intents.initialMessage: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?

intents.name: General Greeting / Start Conversation
intents.description: A customer opens with a greeting or minimal context, requiring a clarifying question to route.
intents.goal: Determine whether they are a new sales lead or an existing customer needing support.

intents.name: Vague Request About Internet Without Business Context
intents.description: The customer asks about internet but doesn’t specify business vs residential or whether they’re an existing customer.
intents.goal: Clarify customer type and route to sales appointment or appropriate support/portal.
intents.initialMessage: How much is internet and what do I need to sign up?
